body.text:
{% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Batutuwan da aka zaba: Rushewar Haƙori 
Zaɓi tambayoyin cikin jerin da ke ƙasa, don samun shawarwarin kula da baki

 1. Bakaken tabo
 2. Makale Abinci
 3. Hakora masu launin Ja da Baki{%else%}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Selected Topic: Cavities/tooth decay 

 Choose an option

 1. Black spots
 2. Food stuck in teeth.
 3. Red & black teeth
{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Rushewar Haƙori: 1{%else%}Cavities/tooth decay: 1{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Bakaken tabo{%else%}Black spots{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Akwai bakaken tabo akan hakora na kuma abinci yana makalewa akai{%else%}There are black spots on my teeth and food gets stuck there.{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Rushewar Haƙori: 2{%else%}Cavities/tooth decay: 2{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Makale Abinci{%else%}Food stuck in teeth{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Duk lokacin da na ci abinci sai ya makale a tsakanin hakorana{%else%}Whenever I eat food it gets stuck in between my teeth{%endif%}

sections.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Rushewar Haƙori: 3{%else%}Cavities/tooth decay: 3{%endif%}

rows.title: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Ja & baki hakora{%else%}Red & black teeth{%endif%}
rows.description: {% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}Hakorana suna canza launi zuwa ja/baki{%else%}My front teeth are turning red/black in the past few days and weeks{%endif%}
